General.Name: Kitex Garments Limited
General.Description: Kitex Garments Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells fabric and readymade garments in India. It primarily offers infant wear comprising body suits; rompters and skirts; burps; sleepsuits; tops and dresses; bibs; sleepwear and SNP; baby quilts and bedding; and training pants and jackets. The company also exports its products to the United States and Europe. Kitex Garments Limited was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Kochi, India.
General.Address: P. B. No. 5, Kizhakkambalam, Kochi, India, 683562
